item.title: Apple claims it will be carbon neutral by 2030
item.description:
How It Started on 2023-09-12

During the iPhone event of September 2023, Apple made a movie claiming it plans to be carbon neutral by 2030. Source: as of September 2023, itâ€™s right there on their YouTube channel.
